title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 1500.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 1500.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to prescribe the methodology for
establishing an ongoing monthly statewide "cost of labor index" and an annual
county or appropriate multi-county "labor market composite wage rate,"as
required by Labor law section 21 [13]. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
1500.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
